hooks.command: npm install --silent && echo '✓ Dependencies installed' && (npx playwright install chromium 2>&1 | grep -E 'Downloaded|already' || echo '⚠ Playwright install skipped (using cached browsers)') && (npm run dev > /tmp/eleventy-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/eleventy-dev.pid && sleep 2 && echo '✓ Dev server started in background' && echo '  Logs: /tmp/eleventy-dev.log' && echo "  URL: http://localhost:8080/")
